member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AdminController.ProvisionPowerBITenants(PrintingBI.API.Models.CustomerDbCredsInputDto)
member.summary: This api provisions the power BI tenants into the system.
member.remarks: The respective tables and configurations will be created in the db provided in the input. By Default 1 admin user will be created as below UserName = "admin", Email = "admin@gmail.com", Password = "12345"

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AdminController.DeProvisionPowerBITenants(PrintingBI.API.Models.CustomerDbCredsInputDto)
member.summary: This api deprovisions all the configurations and removes all the tables and data from db

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AdminController.InsertDepartments(PrintingBI.API.Models.InsertDepartmentsInputDto)
member.summary: This api is inserts the departments once the tenant is provisioned. To insert the departments upload the file with department name and parent dept name
member.param: Db credentials for the tenant and department file(.csv)

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AdminController.InsertUsers(PrintingBI.API.Models.InsertUserInputDto)
member.summary: This api creates the user and maps them to departments and role rights Departments should exists before inserting users. File with users needs to be uploaded in order to insert the users
member.param: Db credentials for the tenant and user file(.csv)

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AdminController.ValidateCustomerTenant(PrintingBI.API.Models.ValidateTenantDto)
member.summary: this api is used to validate the host name of customer

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AdminController.ValidateCustomerDbInfo(PrintingBI.API.Models.CustomerDbCredsInputDto)
member.summary: This api used to validate the database connection
member.param: Database credentials to validate database connection

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AssignReportsToAllController.GetAssignToAllReports
member.summary: Gets all the reports with a flag isAssignedToAllUsers if assigned to all users

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AssignReportsToAllController.SaveAssignReportsToAll(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid})
member.summary: Assigns the provided reports to all the users

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AssignReportsToUserController.GetAllReports(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all the reports assigned to this user. Also reports which are assigned to all the users

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.AssignReportsToUserController.SaveAllReports(System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Guid})
member.summary: Assigns the provided reports to user
member.remarks: If any of the report which is assigned to all users is not provided then that report will be blocked for the user.

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.CommonController.GetAllDepartments
member.summary: This api returns list of departments with department id and department name.
member.remarks: Used when creating or editing user

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.LoginController.AuthenticateUser(PrintingBI.API.Models.LoginDto)
member.summary: Authenticates given user for provided hostname
member.param: Provide the hostname, username or email and password

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.LoginController.ForgotPassword(PrintingBI.API.Models.ForgotPassDto)
member.summary: When the user forgets his/her password and wants to reset using email.
member.param: Model contains HostName and email address
member.remarks: If it is valid email then it will send an email with link to reset password The token is valid for 3 hours

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.LoginController.ResetPassword(PrintingBI.API.Models.ResetPassDto)
member.summary: Api to reset the password after filling the reset password form with token provided in email.
member.param: Model contains HostName , Token , Email address and new password.

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.LoginController.ChangePassword(PrintingBI.API.Models.ChangePassDto)
member.summary: Api to change the user password

member.name: M:PrintingBI.API.Controllers.LoginController.ValidateRefreshToken(PrintingBI.API.Models.RefreshTokenDto)
member.summary: Api used when the jwt token is expired. New token will be assigned for seamless user experience.
member.param: Provide the hostname, username or email and refresh token
